de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.explanations

Class ExplanationWriter<E extends Explanation<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.explanations.ExplanationWriter<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - explanation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureModelExplanationWriter

    public abstract class ExplanationWriter<E extends Explanation<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Transforms explanations into user-friendly strings in natural language.
    Author:
    Timo Günther, Sofia Ananieva

      • setWritingReasonCounts

        public void setWritingReasonCounts(boolean writingReasonCounts)
        Sets the writing reason counts flag.
        Parameters:
        writingReasonCounts - new writing reason counts flag

      • isWritingReasonCounts

        public boolean isWritingReasonCounts()
        Returns the writing reason counts flag. It denotes whether to include the reason count versus explanation count when writing a reason. This acts as an explanation for the reason's confidence.
        Returns:
        the writing reason counts flag

      • getSymbols

        public java.lang.String[] getSymbols()

        Returns the symbols to use with NodeWriter.

        Defaults to logical symbols.

        Returns:
        the symbols to use with NodeWriter

      • setSymbols

        public void setSymbols(java.lang.String[] symbols)
        Sets the symbols to use with NodeWriter.
        Parameters:
        symbols - symbols to use with NodeWriter

      • isWritingLineBreaks

        public boolean isWritingLineBreaks()
        Returns true iff this is writing line breaks. In that case, a line break is written before every reason.
        Returns:
        true iff this is writing line breaks

      • setWritingLineBreaks

        public void setWritingLineBreaks(boolean writingLineBreaks)
        Sets whether to write line breaks.
        Parameters:
        writingLineBreaks - whether to write line breaks
